Intro.title: ETERNAL STORY . Ltd
Intro.description: Established in 2021 with the purpose of promoting local story creation and cultural and creative industries. Its main business areas include game development, incubating original brands with novels and comics as the medium, and small-scale shooting services.

ChapterOne.title: Chapter One
ChapterOne.description: We provide customers with professional, high-quality and creative design and services.

ChapterTwo.title: Chapter Two
ChapterTwo.2023-tap-siac-craft-market-in-spring: 2023 Tap Siac Craft Market in Spring
ChapterTwo.house-of-whisker-mouse-description: The first casual pixel-style video game in Macau, with original stories and characters as an extension of brand creation.
ChapterTwo.idea-has-no-money-description: The channel focuses on story creation. The direction of film creation is mainly divided into several categories. There are creations that focus on secondary creations, creations that promote Macau culture, and original stories.
